User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111208 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111208031134

Steps to reproduce:

Created a webpage with a textarea whose background-color is changed dynamically (for enabling / disabling).


Actual results:

When a background-color is applied to a textarea, the border of the textarea is changed by Firefox (From what I can tell, Firebug is telling me the border-width is changed from 1px [no background-color] to 2px [background-color: white;].  I cannot tell if anything else is changed).


Expected results:

background-color change should not affect border.

HTML file that shows difference attached.


Other browser comparison:
Chrome renders fine.
IE has a change between the 2 textareas.
